column4: the Criminal and Immigration Force detained a foreigner for intentional damage (spray painting on a billboard and new bridge) in Kampot town.------The incident was caught on CCTV at 1 am on June 11
column5: and shows the arrested woman waiting next to a Honda Chaly
column6: while an unidentified male spray painted the billboard and bridge with the tag “Soren 2020”.------Kampot District Department announced that 28 year old British woman Ruby Patricia Wilkins will be charged with ‘intentional damage of state property’.------Source: Kampot District Department Facebook
